## Government of Canada Tender Announcement

### Project Title and Reference Number

EF236-240668 - Consulting Services Architecture and Engineering - Reconstruction of CCC Laferrière
Reference Number: WS4342098190; Doc4342121481

### Solicitation Details

* Amendment Number: 4
* Solicitation Number: WS4342098190
* Publication Date: 23 January 2024
* Tender Closing Date: 26 March 2024 at 14:00
* Amendment Date: 27 March 2024

### Project Overview

Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC), on behalf of Correctional Service Canada (CSC), invites qualified Architectural and Engineering firms to submit a proposal to provide consulting services as part of the CCC Laferrière reconstruction project in Saint-Jérôme, Québec.

### Scope of Work

The selected firm will be responsible for the complete reconstruction of CCC Laferrière, which includes designing, planning, and implementing the necessary infrastructure and services to meet CSC's requirements.

### Requirements

* Professional engineering services (81100000)
* Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price (selection criteria)
* Bid must comply with the Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA) and other listed trade agreements.

### Contract Details

* Expected Contract Start Date: 16 February 2024
* Expected Contract End Date: 31 May 2025

### Contact Information

* Contracting Entity: Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC)
* Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5, Canada
* End User Entity: Correctional Service Canada (CSC)
* Address: 340 Laurier Ave W, Ottawa, Ontario K1P 0P9, Canada
* Contact Person: Joël Lussier (SPAC/PSPC); joel.lussier@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

### Tenders

Accordueil fichier information Corporation is available on the Ariba Discovery website at [https;//discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18595555?extsite=MTg1OTU1NTVfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18595555?extsite=MTg1OTU1NTVfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)
